message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, I am able to offer $100 for the product.
